bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-newest-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-cnxh-{{page}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('推荐', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/home/book/cate.html')).select('.tagBtnClass');
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

  { name: " ⑥ 香香 ⑥ ", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },

  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "o(2)" },
  { name: "      一 般      ", type: "button", action: "o(0)" },
  { name: "       VIP      ", type: "button", action: "o(1)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换进度  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "p(2)" },
  { name: "      连 载      ", type: "button", action: "p(0)" },
  { name: "      完 结     ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换分级  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全 部      ", type: "button", action: "q(0)" },
  { name: "      清 水      ", type: "button", action: "q(1)" },
  { name: "      有 肉     ", type: "button", action: "q(2)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击评论排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "           最新评论           ", type: "button", action: "r(0)" },
  { name: "           最热评论           ", type: "button", action: "r(1)" },

  {
    name: "                   设置填写的页数为评论加载页数                   ",
    type: "button",
    action: "f()"
  },
  { name: "页数：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

'); } String(data).replace(/>,/g, '>'); } else { if (baseUrl.includes('/json/')) { '

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("xxzf-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/favorite')) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.data;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].lastcapter + '〔' + list[i].update_time + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].image,
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].bid
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/1-(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '1-' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kind = (list[i].mhstatus > 0 ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + (list[i].limitVip == 'false' ? '' : 'VIP') + ',' + list[i].keyword;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].auther.replace(/,/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter_title + '〔' + list[i].update_time + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].image,
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].id
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)(-\d-\d-\d)$/, function(match, p1, p2) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + p2;}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
    for (i in list) {
        var kind = (list[i].mhstatus > 0 ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + (list[i].limitVip == 'false' ? '' : 'VIP') + ',' + list[i].keyword;
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].title,
            'author': list[i].auther.replace(/,/g, '/'),
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': list[i].last_chapter_title + '〔' + list[i].update_time + '〕',
            'intro': list[i].desc,
            'cover': Get('url') + list[i].image,
            'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].id
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var searchkey = java.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"));
    if (!JSON.parse(next).result.list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.list[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
    date = String(list[list.length - 1].create_time);
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].title;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? (title + '〔' + date + '〕') : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/home/book/capter/id/' + list[i].id,
            'time': String(list[i].create_time)
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/home/api/searchk?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&type=1&pageNo={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
